name: British Bunting / Red, White and Blue / Olympics
description:
3.5 meters of British bunting in red, white and blue.
Great for any celebrations, especially the Olympics!

Mixed Fabric
10 Flags approx. 22cm long

name: Funny Seaside Peep Board... FOR HIRE /£85 a day
description:
This very British seaside peep board is now available for hire.

A days hire is £85, plus delivery (please get in touch for a free quote – hello@rosieshorter.co.uk)

Measuring 6 x 4 ft & free standing with an hinged A-frame for support.
Great for party’s, weddings, festivals or any special occassion it will be sure to get everyone laughing.

(Based in Brighton, UK)

name: Fun Photo Props / Mustaches, Glasses & Pipe
description:
These photo props are great for all to enjoy. Adding fun and personality to your next party.

This 8 piece set will add smiles and laughter to your party, creating some fantastic photos. A mix of glasses, mustaches and pipe are included.

Great for weddings, dinners, events ... or how about Christmas! It's a great way to loosen people up and get them laughing.

If you would like a custom pack, themed items or bulk orders please get in touch rosieshorter@hotmail.co.uk

Props are made from black foam and attached to bamboo skewers.

name: Funny Peep Board
description:
Peep Boards are great for events, especially if you want to get some funny pictures of friends and family. 

Shown here is my latest commission for Coast magazine. The peep board went down a storm, at 6x4 ft this board is great fun for all ages and brought a bit of the British summertime to all.

Here are a few shots of the board and how it is supported. The board has to withstand British weather and so all the wood is treated with wood stain and the image has several layers of matt varnish over to protect it. There is a narrow capping along the top to stop the worst of the rain and small metal feet to raise it off the ground slightly. The hinged 'A' frame means the board will stand independently and can be easily be packed up for storage.

The price is for a 6x4ft Peep board with two characters and head holes. Together we discuss what design you would like which I will draw up and show you before painting begins. The frame and structure will be the same as here. The detachable blackboard is not included.

Please email me to discuss the design you would like on your peep board or any extra requirements you may have - rosieshorter@hotmail.co.uk 

Please allow 21 days for production.
Delivery - pick up is an option also if you do want want to pay shipping. Shipping may vary due to destinations within UK.

name: Magic Light up Wands
description:
Theses magic light up wands are handmade and can be crafted to your specification. Approximately 30cm in length these are a great gift or fancy dress prop. All wands are unique and individual and come in all shapes and sizes, colours and detailing.

With a discrete click on, click off switch in the base they are easy to operate. This is attached to a cell battery which cannot be changed and this in turn lights a bright white led at the end. Each wand comes in its own string pull bag.

Below are the current wands I have available but I can make to your requirements - 

Plain Dark
Plain Light Brown
Plain Pale
Pale Half Spiral Vine
Pale Full Spiral Vine

When ordering please let me know the style of wand you would like by contacting me at - rosieshorter@hotmail.co.uk

http://www.rshorter.blogspot.com/

(These are not a toy and are not suitable for small children.)
